channel.title: [PI] Help! A.S.A.P [Pi] REP++
channel.description: Hey mopar. I have this aggravating little kid coming on my server spamming, and switching ip's. Any thoughts on how to Gateway ban someone? Or if somebody would provide me the code? I would love you to death... ;)

item.title: [PI] Help! A.S.A.P [Pi] REP++
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

If he multi logs, first make it so you can’t multi login. Next, check if he always spams the same message. If he does, add a check to ban someone who says that message.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help! A.S.A.P [Pi] REP++
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“unh0ly, post:3, topic:386058”]Yeah, but isnt there anyway to prevent it? what if multiple people end up figuring this out?
Our servers will be flooded[/quote]
I myself don’t know.
Honestly, the god of PI (I Vain I) would probably know.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help! A.S.A.P [Pi] REP++
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“unh0ly, post:1, topic:386058”]Hey mopar. I have this aggravating little kid coming on my server spamming, and siwtching ip’s. Any thoughts on how to Gateway ban someone? Or if somebody would provide me the code? I would love you to death…
;)[/quote]
This has happened multiple times to multiple people.
All I can suggest is keeping your server off for like 30 minutes.
The spammer will think you gave up and go troll somewhere else.

Read full topic
